title: What champ should I use on this account?
body:
I am going to set myself a challenge. Get to plat on my smurf by playing only one champion. 

Post here what champion you think I can't do it with, **or if someone already posted the champion you were going to post, upvote them**, I will pick the champion with the highest upvotes and play only that champion all the way to plat in season 5 on this account.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KulFXcOh,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-19T00:32:02.700+0000)
>
> What if they get banned...

If they get banned I have to dodge.

So far Karma and Urgot are tied for first place with 2 votes each.

Karma would be far too easy, she is practically freelo mid and top, and can support.

> [{quoted}](name=your hero batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KulFXcOh,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-01-19T04:36:37.994+0000)
>
> If they get banned I have to dodge.
> 
> So far Karma and Urgot are tied for first place with 2 votes each.
> 
> Karma would be far too easy, she is practically freelo mid and top, and can support.

Lol, I voted Urgot up. I withdraw my submission. You must URGOT!

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KulFXcOh,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T04:44:50.788+0000)
>
> Lol, I voted Urgot up. I withdraw my submission. You must URGOT!

I'm fine with Urgot, I don't think he is as weak as people think.

> [{quoted}](name=your hero batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KulFXcOh,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T05:22:25.950+0000)
>
> I'm fine with Urgot, I don't think he is as weak as people think.

My friend plays a lot of Urgot. He is a strong pick, provided you play him well. He has even gotten pentas and gone legendary with him. I want you playing Urgot because he deserves more play.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KulFXcOh,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T07:06:39.194+0000)
>
> My friend plays a lot of Urgot. He is a strong pick, provided you play him well. He has even gotten pentas and gone legendary with him. I want you playing Urgot because he deserves more play.

I like the got. Too bad teemo is winning now. I would much rather play urgot guys, vote that %%%% up. Maybe I could become the best urgot OCE? :O

I feel like Urgot is fairly strong, people just don't pick him because of his low win rate, which is mainly low due to him being the go to troll pick.

{{champion:131}} 
you want an ap bruiser, you got one.
you want an assassin, you got one.
you want a ap tank, you sort of have one if you get fed.
you want an adc, well why the **f**uck not, you got one.
any lane, any role.
